inclusion.criterion: Type I or II diabetic patientCKD stage 3 ( eGFR = 30 - 59 ml/min) or stage 4 ( eGFR < 15-29 ml/min)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Low SMg levels (1.4-1.9 mg/dL; 0.58-0.78 mM) to normal (1.7-2.4 mg/dL; 0.7 -1.1 mmol/L; 1.4-2.0 mEq/L)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Women of child-bearing age should be using contraceptives as Hormonal contraceptive or Intra-uterine device.

exclusion.criterion: Any condition impairing intestinal absorption of Mg (e.g: chronic pancreatitis, short bowel syndrome)
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old Asian female infant presenting with jaundice. She has an uncomplicated pregnancy and birth history, and is currently breastfed.
